entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 3:13PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Thunderstorms with Heavy Rain Possible Through This Evening... Today is very similar to Monday over the Eastern Interior, with numerous showers and isolated thunderstorms occuring this afternoon that will continue into this evening. Some of these thunderstorms will have heavy rain and half inch hail. This could cause brief urban flooding in parking lots, roads and drainage

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 2:55PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Surf Possible Friday Into Saturday... Elevated surf is expected to develop Friday and continue into Saturday. Northwest winds of 15 to 25 mph are expected Friday into Saturday causing large waves to wash up onto the beach. Minor beach erosion may occur and belongings left on the beach could wash away.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley; Chukchi Sea Coast; Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula

entry.summary: ...Elevated Surf Wednesday Through Thursday... Elevated surf is expected to develop Wednesday and continue into Thursday.
